inclusion.criterion: Use of CSII or MDI therapy for ≥ 6 months
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of anti-diabetic medicine (other than insulin)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of allergy or intolerance to glucagon or glucagon-like products
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Females who are pregnant, breast-feeding or intend to become pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Inability to understand the individual information and to give informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is homeless and has lost his insulin supply, but he reports being on insulin since diagnosis.
